tool_description: Enter your text, and watch the API respond with a completion that attempts to match the context or pattern you provided. Using the latest model from OpenAI, GPT-4.

api_list.name: Enter your question and get response
api_list.description: With this endpoint, users can send their questions to the chatbot, in return receiving a text string response from the bot. This feature is especially handy for integrating the chatbot into applications or websites that require swift and precise answers to user queries.
